title: Trem2
abstract: The aberrant splice acceptor site in the Trem2*R47H mouse was humanized resulting in the Trem2*R47H humanized splice site (Trem2*R47H  Trem2*R47H mice had alternative splicing leading to reduced  We demonstrated that Trem2*R47H and Trem2*R47H
